SDM.BurdensPenalty: Each burden imposes a -1 to all rolls
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.all_save_bonus: Bonus to all saving throw rolls
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.base_damage_mult: Starting damage multiplier value for critical hits
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.blood_dice.bonus: Extra blood dice (increases the max number of blood dice)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.blood_dice.dice_: Blood dice type, override with: (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12 or d20)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.blood_dice.enabl: Enables access to blood dice, boolean property. Use change mode Override
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.borrowed_life.en: Enables access to borrowed life, boolean property. Use change mode Override
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.borrowed_life.ma: Changes borrowed life max value (default is your standard life max value)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.burden_penalty_b: Burden Pernalty (negative values to remove penalty)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.burden_slots_bon: Affects the number of burden slots
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.damage_bonus: Bonus damage added to all weapon, power and album of power damage rolls
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.hero_dice.bonus: Extra hero dice (increases the max number of hero dice)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.hero_dice.dice_t: Hero dice type, override with: (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12 or d20)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.item_slots_bonus: Affects the number of item slots
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.packed_item_slot: Number of packade items (not readied items) that won't take item slots
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.power_cost_bonus: Bonus value (positive number) deducted from all powers total cost
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.power_slots_bonu: Number of powers that won't take either item or trait slots
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.readied_armor_ta: Readied armor take no item slots. Boolean property, use change mode Override
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.readied_item_slo: Number of readied items that won't take item slots
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.small_item_slots: Number small sized (sp) items that won't take items slots
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.speed: Caravan speed value (integer number ranging from -3 to 2)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.temporary_life.e: Enables access to temporary life, boolean property. Use change mode Override
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.temporary_life.m: Determines the maximum value of your temporary life
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.tourist_dice.bon: Extra tourist dice (increases the max number of tourist dice)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.tourist_dice.dic: Tourist dice type, override with: (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12 or d20)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.tourist_dice.ena: Enables access to tourist dice, boolean property. Use change mode Override
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.tourist_dice.max: Determines the maximum number of tourist dice (set to your current charisma)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.trait_slots_bonu: Affects the number of trait slots
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.ward_bonus: Ward bonus (affects mental defense and all saving throw rolls)
SDM.EffectsLabel.system.weapon_item_slot: Number weapon items that won't take items slots

SDM.GroupInitiativeErrorNoTokens: Select all tokens that will be part of the encounter. No need to create the encounter beforehand.
SDM.HeroDiceHealingTip:
Left-click: roll Hero Dice for healing
Right-click: add Hero Dice to a shared Bonus Pool
SDM.HeroDiceModeHint: Choose whether hero dice should raise or lower a roll result. Decrease will floor dice at 1 and never generate extra exploding dice.

SDM.MoraleEqualOutcomeMessage: The NPC redoubles their effort, hoping a last push brings victory. They gain a bonus on their next action.
SDM.MoraleOverOutcomeMessage: The NPC breaks: flees, retreats, surrenders or ends combat in some other way. The better trained, the steadier the withdrawal.
SDM.MoraleUnderOutcomeMessage: The NPC continues to struggle, grimly determined, resolute for now.
SDM.NoPowers: Empty Power Album. Add powers by dragging and dropping a Power gear, or by clicking +New Power
SDM.NotchedItemAction:
left-click: mark item as broken
right-click: repair item
SDM.NPCTraitAdaptable: Adaptable. Copy an enemy's last used special ability.
SDM.NPCTraitBonded: Bonded. Spend life to grant an ally an equal bonus on their next roll.
SDM.NPCTraitCharger: Charger. Double damage after a direct charge.
SDM.NPCTraitCircleOfPain: Circle of Pain. Nearby allies deal and suffer double damage. Adjacent foes just suffer double damage
SDM.NPCTraitCommonHumanity: Common Humanity. Spend 1 life to appeal for understanding and parlay (save)
SDM.NPCTraitDeathCurse: Death Curse. Killer suffers a psychic burden.
SDM.NPCTraitDenial: Denial. Adjacent enemies have difficulty moving.
SDM.NPCTraitDesperateShot: Desperate Shot. Deal triple damage when at 1 life.
SDM.NPCTraitDoubleAttack: Double Attack. Attacks twice with one action.
SDM.NPCTraitEvasive: Evasive. Sacrifice attack to add bonus to defense.
SDM.NPCTraitFeedback: Feedback. Each hit suffered adds 1d6 to damage.
SDM.NPCTraitFrenzy: Frenzy. Spend 2 defense to get a free attack.
SDM.NPCTraitKillbite: Killbite. Gets free attack on death.
SDM.NPCTraitMartyr: Martyr. On death, grants their bonus to nearby allies.
SDM.NPCTraitOnceAgain: Once Again. Revives 2 rounds after death. Once.
SDM.NPCTraitOvercharge: Overcharge. Spend level life to double damage.
SDM.NPCTraitPhase: Phase. Spend 1 life to become a ghost for 1 round.
SDM.NPCTraitResistomorph: Resistomorph. After being hit by an attack, ignore that attack type for one round.
SDM.NPCTraitRiposte: Riposte. Free counterattack against missed attacks.
SDM.NPCTraitRockblood: Rockblood. Below half life, double defense.
SDM.NPCTraitShatter: Shatter. On death, level x d4* dmg to all nearby.
SDM.NPCTraitShieldfriend: Shieldfriend. Can take a hit meant for nearby allies.
SDM.NPCTraitSlam: Slam. Spend 5 life: knock down adjacent foes (save).
SDM.NPCTraitSpringer: Springer. Jump away after attacking without provoking an opportunity attack.
SDM.NPCTraitStabber: Stabber. Double damage to surprised opponents.
SDM.NPCTraitSteadfast: Steadfast. Cannot be moved against their will.
SDM.NPCTraitTactical: Tactical. After being hit by an attack, gains +3 defense against that attack type.
SDM.NPCTraitTeamwork: Teamwork. +2 bonus and defense next to an ally.
SDM.NPCTraitTickingCorpse: Ticking Corpse. Deals double damage to all nearby 1d4 rounds after death (save to negate).
SDM.NPCTraitToolmaker: Toolmaker. Improvise a weapon or tool in 1 round.
SDM.PowerCostHint: Life cost for each power level
SDM.ReactionMessage1: They come at you, like raving agents of cosmic corruption.
SDM.ReactionMessage12: Friendly, interested. They'll help, given half a chance.
SDM.ReactionMessage13plus: They insist on helping, even if you don't need help. Rude to say no, but they will waste your... Oh, dear. Cup of tea?
SDM.ReactionMessage2: Aggressive, hostile. They attack, given half an excuse.
SDM.SavingThrowDoomMessage: What was, will be. No save.
SDM.Settings.ResetDefaults.Confirm: Reset all fields in this section to their default values?
SDM.Settings.ResetDefaults.Title: Reset Settings
SDM.SettingsBaseBurdenSlotsHint: Base number of burden slots for a character
SDM.SettingsBaseDefenseHint: Base physical defense value for characters
SDM.SettingsBaseItemSlotsHint: Base number of item slots for a character
SDM.SettingsBaseMentalDefenseHint: Base mental defense value for characters
SDM.SettingsBaseMoraleFormulaHint: Base Morale roll formula for NPCs
SDM.SettingsBaseReactionFormulaHint: Base roll formula for Reaction rolls
SDM.SettingsBaseSocialDefenseHint: Base social defense value for characters
SDM.SettingsBaseTraitSlotsHint: Base number of trait slots for a character
SDM.SettingsChromatypeHint:
Pick your chromatype in the light of the polychrome UI! (change UI highlight color)
Check Dice So Nice: 3D Dice Settings for a "SDM Chromatype Dice" theme
SDM.SettingsCurrencyImgHint: Default image for new currency items created by the 'Give Cash' Referee Macro
SDM.SettingsCurrencyNameHint: The primary currency used in the game world
SDM.SettingsDefaultHardLimitValueHint: Determines the maximum bonus allowed on d20 rolls
SDM.SettingsDefaultHeroDiceTypeHint: Changes the default hero dice type for all characters
SDM.SettingsDefaultMaxPowersHint: Default maximum number of stored powers in an album of power
SDM.SettingsDefaultSaveValueHint: The initial value of save, the target value for saving throw rolls
SDM.SettingsDiceSoNiceChromatypeHint: Allows you to use a different Chromatype color just for your 3D dice
SDM.SettingsEscalatorDieHint: Every roll will be increased by this amount
SDM.SettingsExtendedSkillRanksHint: Enables a 4th and a 5th skill rank options
SDM.SettingsGroupPlayersToFriendlyTokens: Group Players with Friendly Tokens on Group Initiative
When enabled, players are grouped together with friendly tokens.
SDM.SettingsHealingHouseRuleHint: Roll hero dice twice and keep the highest result
SDM.SettingsLevelUpSoundFxHint: Changes the sound effect played on character level up
SDM.SettingsLuckySevenRuleHint: The referee provides a benefit or bonus, when a natural 7 is rolled. Even if the roll is otherwise a failure.
SDM.SettingsRerollInitiativeEveryRoundHi: When enabled, it will reroll group initiatives every new round.
SDM.SettingsReverseShiftKeyHint:
Reverse Shift+Click behavior in roll buttons.
When enabled, using Shift+Click will be required to open custom roll dialogs.
SDM.SettingsSavingThrowBaseRollFormulaHi: Base roll formula for all saving throw rolls
SDM.SettingsShouldPlayLevelUpSoundFxHint: Plays a sound effect when a character levels up
SDM.SettingsSkillModifierStepHint: Changes the bonus amount given in a roll by each skill rank
SDM.SettingsUseHardLimitRuleHint: Enables a hard limit on bonuses applied to d20 rolls
SDM.SplitHint: Drag the slider or type a number. Totals must add up to the original quantity.
SDM.TableDesc.BrickBastions:
Floating shields, animated armors, soil golems, lumberlings, horde zombies, crawling flesh centipedes,
armor vomes,gelatinous skeletons, and other creatures that can't avoid getting hit. Often slow.
Vastlands GuideBook (VLG p. 163)
SDM.TableDesc.CrystalCannons:
Electric wizards, gas goblins, spore shooters, drop bears, doom discs, floating rayballs, porcelain liches,
thanatic fanatics, and others that deal damage but can't take it.
Vastlands GuideBook (VLG p. 163)
SDM.TableDesc.DartingDodgers:
Hoptoads, lashing leapers, vomitorrials, nimblers, fire furies, nightmare ninjas, neon knights, mercury golems,
bioenhanced bandits, and other creatures that depend on their speed to avoid attacks and score hits.
Vastlands GuideBook (VLG p. 163)
SDM.TableDesc.ErraticExpendables:
Doom drones, exploding skeletons, suicide squirrels, spitborn ghoulies, shackleminded grenadiers, bicycle cavalry.
Not expected to return from the fight.
Vastlands GuideBook (VLG p. 163)
SDM.TableDesc.GenericSynthesizedCreature:
The gods in their post-mechanical kindness, the demiurges,the life generators,the mother machines,
the matter makers, the beast spews, they give forth many things.
Though many fail to live, some live to terrify. If it's alive and has character, this table will serve.
Vastlands GuideBook (VLG p. 162)
SDM.TableDesc.HumansOfThePananthropy:
Common pan-humanity includes all close-to-baseline sentient and soulful post-humans, retro-humans, dwarfs,
half-elfs, halflings, quarterlings, half-orcs, golems, liches, iron humans, lings, and ghosts.
If it lives in a town and does human things, it's probably a human of some sort.
Vastlands GuideBook (VLG p. 163)
SDM.WithoutRollingDice: to increase Bonus Hero Dice Pool
